attributes.action: Help India with PPE, medical supplies and oxygen.
attributes.additional_details: Watching the coverage the sky news team has given and seeing the desperate pleas from Indian nationals is utterly saddening to see. They need whatever help they can get.
attributes.background: India is really suffering from coronavirus they need help with how overwhelmed the country is becoming from the virus. The UK and it’s allies need to help with the demand they desperately need with oxygen and medical supplies.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Increase support for India in the Covid Crisis: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/584152

Send excess equipment to countries in humanitarian covid crisis: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/584188

Once priority groups in the UK are vaccinated redirect Covid-19 vaccines abroad: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/572802

You may be interested to know that on 25 April the Government announced that it was sending medical equipment to India to support the country in its fight against COVID-19: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/uk-sends-life-saving-medical-equipment-to-india
